data.name: Ping Pong
data.description:
An awesome Ping Pong game for mobile has arrived! Pick up your racket and challenge your friends. Play Ping Pong on any device you have: a smartphone, TV, mobile VR. Any kind of multiplayer is possible, it feels like playing a real table tennis game. Add your avatar and customize the racket to achieve the individual look so that every opponent would know who he’s dealing with!

You can play this game using VicoVR Full Body Motion Controller if you want fully immersive experience. You can also play it on your smartphone or like any other cardboard game in any virtual reality headset you like. 

We recommend playing this game with VicoVR Controller to move your whole body in virtual worlds. More info here: http://vicovr.com

changelog.change_log:
Having heard your feedback, in this update we have radically redesigned the management. 
Mode "FULL MOVEMENT" is suitable for fans of RacketFury, this mode provides full control over the racket, but can cause dizziness.
The "DYNAMIC RACKET" mode is very intuitive and simple, but does not cause dizziness. This mode allows you to feel like a real tennis player.

In the next updates we will continue to improve the management of the racket, add spins and improve the opponent.

In this update, we have improved the physics of the ball, added sets with the system of rules of table tennis, including the first serve on his half of the table. 
We also fixed a problem with the network code and control of the racket. 

In the next updates we will continue to improve the physics in the game so that you can get the best experience from playing table tennis.
